title: Zhu Dike Zhi Caihong Jiejie Jiang Gushi
synopsis: "Pig Dick Literacy: Color Red Sister Telling Stories" selects classic Chinese and foreign stories, in the form of animation that children love to see, make a new interpretation and interpretation of classic stories, and strongly invites famous children's show hosts to dub them with affection. These stories can not only develop children's imagination, broaden children's knowledge, stimulate children's logical thinking, but also cultivate children's perception and interest in knowledge. Now, let us enter the colorful fairy tale world together~ (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 猪迪克之彩虹姐姐讲故事

title: Kong Tian Zhandui
synopsis: It tells the story of the young air and sky team rising up against the invaders after the earth was invaded by alien evil forces. Mecha modeling, the game between justice and evil, outer space, gunfights, heroism, science fiction, fantasy...constructed the "five elements to restrain each other, energy wins", the correct values of justice must defeat evil, and incorporate many domestic and foreign animation works in recent years Hot spots are produced and broadcasted in the form of unit dramas.(translated from douban)

title: Kong Tian Zhandui Zui Xing Shou Dazhan
synopsis: In order to save the planet, several robot friends from the outer planet traveled to the earth under the guidance of the doctor, and at the same time started the adventure of fighting wits and courage with the extremely evil forces and the Shadow Legion. (translated from douban)

title: Shenhai Tegong Dui
synopsis: "Guardians of the ocean, protect the global ocean resources", a group of young people who love the ocean, each of them has their own field of expertise, and when combined, they will always burst out unexpected power. Dr. Tortoise has been committed to protecting marine resources for a hundred years, is the mentor of the entire guard team, and has witnessed the birth of multiple marine exploration records. In order to in-depth study and protect the endangered resources, Dr. Tortoise organized a batch of refined guardians to silently guard the mysterious and vast ocean area. 70% of the earth’s surface is covered by sea water, and the deep-sea special forces are equipped with monitoring systems around the world to prevent foreign enemies from invading and protecting our marine homes. "The Demon King Attempting to Rule the Ocean" Lemo Anson, led by the Dark Legion led by Modo, invaded the sea repeatedly. They not only want to seize the spar of the mysterious treasure of the ocean, but also destroy the precious ocean resources. The Dark Legion has become the first target of the Ocean Guard. In order to get the gem, Modo held the living marine fossil-Nautilus, and used him to find the millennium spar. In order to understand and save the creatures in the deep sea and save the ocean town, the deep-sea task force led by Xiao Longrong went deep into the dark realm. With the help of various marine life partners, they started a wise battle with the Dark Legion and successfully destroyed the conspiracy of Lemo Anson. , Restored the security of the entire ocean world.(translated from douban)

title: Shenhai Tegong Dui Zhi Chao Neng Jing Shi
synopsis: "Deep Sea Commando: Super Spar" is a 3D children's animation film with the theme of "Exploring Ocean Culture", science fiction and environmental protection. Four spars with magical power broke the calm of the ocean town, and one of the spars awakened the sea monster, Lemo Anson. In order to rule the entire ocean, it led the Dark Legion and continued to search for the remaining three spars. The octopus brother Mo Mo and his elder brother in the small town accidentally picked up a spar. When the disaster struck, Mo Mo was rescued by Xiao Ronglong, but his elder brother was demonized by Lemo Anson and named Haig. In the fierce battle with Haig, Limo Ansen kidnapped Momo and threatened the special attack team to hand over the spar. The critical moment Xiaoronglong stepped forward to rescue Momo, and at the same time the demonized brother was desperately shouted by Momo. The sound awakened his consciousness, in order to protect his brother from being hurt, he wrapped Lemo Ansen and fell towards the bottom of the volcano.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 深海特攻队之超能晶石

title: !NVADE SHOW!
synopsis: Music video of the project band RAISE A SUILEN

title: Qiche Xiao Zhen Huwei Dui
synopsis: The car residents live happily in the small town. Suddenly one day, the mayor of the automobile town left without saying goodbye. Can everything be normal in a car town without the mayor? Who will the residents of the town choose as the new mayor? And what conspiracy will the former mayor encounter when he leaves? Let's solve these doubts together! (translated from iqiyi)

title: ONE OF US
synopsis: Music video of the project band Afterglow

title: TITLE IDOL
synopsis: Music video of the project band Pastel＊Palettes.

title: Daylight
synopsis: Music video of the project band Morfonica

title: Dongwu Tegong Ju
synopsis: Who said cat and mouse can't be friends? Who said that hurt friends can't save the world together? In a modern world composed of a variety of animals, Zhang Dawei (cat), an elite of the animal secret service bureau, met Aqiu (rat), a waste wood technology house, by chance. When the arrogant, hard-mouthed Zhang Dawei met with humor and cuteness , Aqiu who values love and righteousness, what joyful and funny stories will happen? This pair of cat and mouse partners, who were involved in a terrifying conspiracy, teamed up with other partners on the way to solve the case. With the appearance of a behind-the-scenes man named "Ice Devil", the chilling truth gradually surfaced...(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Meirenyu De Qihuan Maoxian
synopsis: As one of the classic fairy tales, the daughter of the sea, the mermaid, has been widely circulated in the world along with the childhood memories of generations. This film tells the story of a beautiful and brave little mermaid fighting against the shackles of tradition and pursuing freedom in a mysterious ocean country to change his destiny. This film reproduces the innocent world of "Mermaid", and uses positive and positive content to once again arouse public interest in this classic theme. (translated from douban)

title: Xingji Da Taowang
synopsis: In the future, the earth's water resources will be exhausted. The nuclear war over water broke out and human beings lost their fertility. The survivors fled the earth one after another. Dragon Wing, the last child of mankind, and his single father, Long Ke, struggled to survive in the desert by collecting the remaining water. 　　 The arrival of alien species announced the countdown to the destruction of the earth. Facing a desperate situation, how will the father and daughter find hope of survival... (translated from douban)

title: Ali Baba Yu Shen Deng
synopsis: Robber's Scimitar was in the legendary desert ruins-Azrod. When digging for treasures, he accidentally alarmed the nightmare in the seal. The nightmare bewitched the scimitar to open the seal, and the nightmare once again resurrected and darkness fell. 　　The seal master Xiao Zhizhi was invited to participate in the auction. A treasure chest from Azrod suddenly released the curse of nightmare, dragging Xiao Zhizhi into a terrible dream. 　　 In order to save Xiaozhizhi’s Ali Baba, he went through the Adventure Collection and judged from the prophecy that the nightmare seal had been loosened, and the terrifying monster was about to be born, and it must be stopped immediately. 　　 After learning this news, Aladdin, a rookie in the adventure world, made a battle with Alibaba. Whoever defeats the Nightmare Lord first, who is the strongest adventurer, begins a competition concerning the reputation of adventurers. 　　 The resurrected Nightmare Lord releases dark energy, turning the scimitar into an invulnerable monster. Ali Baba and Aladdin teamed up to defeat the Scimitar, and finally, with the cooperation of the magic lamp elves and Xiao Sesame, sealed the nightmare again, and the world returned to peace.(translated from douban)

title: Qimiao Wangguo Zhi Mofa Qi Yuan
synopsis: The story takes place in a wonderful magical kingdom. Anser is a lively and lovely princess. One day, Princess Anser discovers that her mother Queen Rena is cursed by evil magic. In order to save her mother, Anser embarks on a journey to find magic gems. On the way, she and her friend Caffee were attacked by Warcraft, and met the fairy fairy Natasia and the two guardians Fengqi and Reich, and also learned the secret of the magic gem, how the little princess Anser will defeat the evil queen Sa Cara embarks on a magical adventure to save the kingdom. (translated from douban)

title: Zui Ke Ai De Ren
synopsis: my country's first cartoon "The Cutest Man" with the theme of Resist US Aid Korea was launched on BTV Kaku Children's TV at 18:30 on October 18. Originally produced by Kaku Children, the film vividly tells 7 real heroic stories of the Chinese People’s Volunteers in 14 episodes in the form of cartoons. It reproduces the vigor and tragic struggle of the Chinese People’s Volunteers 66 years ago to defend their home and country. (translated from douban)

title: Zui Ke Ai De Ren(2020)
synopsis: In 1950, the Korean War broke out and the war raged on both sides of the Yalu River, seriously threatening the security of New China. Countless outstanding young people have joined the Chinese People’s Volunteers to defend their hard-won happy homeland and the new China.(translated from douban)

title: Long Shen Zhizi
synopsis: In the severe drought in Chaozhou, the people have no livelihood. Huang Batian wants to forcefully marry Yugu, and Bailong helps him. Grandma Jiao begged Bailong to rain to save the people of Chaozhou. Bailong privately dropped heavy rain, violated the rules of heaven, and was fined to the world. In order to avoid the invincible Huang Batian, the Jade Emperor ordered Chaozhou to sink to the bottom. Bailong struggled to deal with the heavenly soldiers, while Yugu and grandma led the people of Yizhou out of Chaozhou City. Finally, the flood flooded the sinking Chaozhou City and Huang Batian into the bottom of the water, turning it into the current Chaohu Lake. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Po Hai Da Zhuangyuan
synopsis: The poor and sour talented little Po boy came to Beijing to rush for the exam, and met "sturdy woman", quack liar, ruthless killer and others, leading to a series of ridiculous and ridiculous stories. There were surprises and no dangers along the way, and he even got the top prize. Afterwards, Xiao Pohai relied on his extraordinary skills to compile a puppet who killed the ancient city of Luoyang and cracked a "big" case.(translated from douban)

title: Shibing Shunliu: Bing Wang Zhengfeng
synopsis: China's first military-themed cartoon continues the vivid character image and passionate plot based on six years of TV series precipitation, and uses the most cutting-edge animation technology to fully show the post-90s military life and modern military warfare. The story of the film is based on the active ace special warfare brigade, condensing the actual combat experience of the ace troops, centering on the "king of soldiers" competition, and presenting modern warfare and classic battles realistically through immersive experience, telling everyone about bravery, friendship, and male bloodliness. The story of self-growth and youth practice. (translated from douban)

title: Hua Qian Gu Zhi Hua Hun Zhi Lu
synopsis: A natural disaster catastrophe, the purple magic orchid grows wantonly in the valley where humans live. It can sink people until they lose their lives. Only Hua Qiangu survived because of the guarding of the flower god tree. But the baby infiltrated with purple magic orchid poison brought by the beast Phoenix from outside the valley broke Hua's eternal peace. The king and queen of Huaqianya violated Huaqianya's ancestral precept to prevent outsiders from entering and took the baby, named Princess Peony, and raised her to thrive. The flower god tree suddenly withered, and the princess Peony couldn't afford to be sick, causing Hua Qiangu to suspicious all living beings, petitioning the king to send the princess away. The queen couldn't give up her mother-daughter love, and asked for help from the Flower God Tree, willingly sacrificed herself to go to the black enchantment to let the flower soul return, but due to the powerful power of the purple magic orchid, the queen was trapped and never returned. Ten years later, Peony grew up, the purple magic orchid came back, and Hua Qiangu suffered an unprecedented disaster. The princess Peony remembers the queen's teachings and embarks on an adventure journey with the seeds of the flower soul in order to save Hua Qiangu. (translated from douban)

title: Wu Sheng Guangong
synopsis: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the relatives were domineering, the eunuchs were in charge, the heroes were fighting for hegemony, and natural disasters continued. In this era of war, a military commander who is as heavy as a mountain of righteousness appeared in Yuncheng, Jiezhou. His loyal, righteous and courageous life left an epic heroic deed in history. He is Wu Sheng Guan Gong. The film has classic historical passages from Guan Yu Taoyuan's three knots, Wenjiu Zhan Huaxiong, five passes and six generals to single-handed meeting, flooding the seven army and other classic historical passages, stringing the legendary life of Guan Gong following his elder brother, Kuang supporting the Han room, and Megatron China. In the folklore, the myths such as fighting Chiyou to save the common people are cleverly presented, which fully restores Guan Gong, a Chinese legendary hero who has flourished in the spring and autumn. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Ta Lixian Ji Zhi Jiyi Senlin
synopsis: The clever and lively talented girl Xiaota accidentally walked into the answer shop full of mystery, where she met the old secret full of secrets and the weird pink dragon Xiao Q, where all the questions can be answered. With the help of Xiao Q, Xiaota successfully obtained the Wangyou optical device and helped his mother forget the pain of his father's death. However, when Xiaota was happy, she discovered that her mother had forgotten not only the pain of his father's death, but also the fact that his father was dead. In order to help her mother regain her memory, Xiaota hurried back to the answer shop with the Wangyou Optical Device. No, an accident caused the Wangyou Optical Device to bring Xiaota into the world of memory, which is full of magical beasts and thrilling. . Here, Xiaota met the kind and lovely Remembrance Dog, the magical flying mushroom, the powerful tree man, and the power-hungry Xidi...In the Remembrance World, the Little Tower embarked on a wonderful journey full of courage and memories.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 小塔历险记之记忆森林

title: Long Hu Ji Zhi Zhongyi Guanyunzhang
synopsis: The film uses the classic Chinese classic "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" as its story background. It tells the story of the protagonist Guan Yunchang and his righteous brother Liu Xuande, who valued love and righteousness, and his righteous brother Liu Xuande fell into Cao Ying after being separated in the war. Difficulties, all the way through five stages and six generals, in the process of looking for brother Qianli step by step, the moving story of clarifying his ideals and pursuits. (translated from douban)

title: Da Luan——Zhou Enlai Tongnian Dushu De Gushi
synopsis: In Zhou Enlai's childhood, China was worried about foreign and domestic troubles. In order to save the country from peril, Zhou Enlai began a arduous exploration of the Chinese road. This film tells about Zhou Enlai's self-improvement, hardworking and studious since childhood, and his ambition to "study for the rise of China" in his childhood. Zhou Enlai's growth process and the cultivation of excellent moral character hope to have a cordial and far-reaching enlightenment effect on the cultivation of teenagers' personality. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 大鸾——周恩来童年读书的故事

title: Dai Gua Xiongdi
synopsis: Dumb and Gua are very good friends. They feel that they can repair everything with their own power. Their lives are also full of joy: changing the lawn mower that needs wiring to a solar wireless automatic type, and in order to catch mice in the garden Punching holes everywhere, transforming the drum washing machine into a bullfighting machine, making wind generators for electric trains, and turning carpets into automatic conveyor belts for easy handling of books... In every transformation, the result is not always successful. But the two dumb brothers found the infinite fun of doing it on their own, and also gained infinite confidence and courage to challenge. (translated from douban)

title: Xin Yugongyishan
synopsis: The film tells the story of Yugong Yishan in the Neolithic Age thousands of years ago through the perspective of a teenager. 　　 The arrogant mountain god piled the Wangwu and Taihang mountains at the door of Yugong's house. The stubborn Yugong was determined to dig the mountain out. In the face of many doubts and huge difficulties, Yu Gong did not shrink back, and took his son and the villagers to fight. In the struggle, Yu Gong’s son Qingfeng and the mountain elf shimmer contacted each other, understood each other, and found another solution: removing the mountain. In the end, he was not only shocked by Yugong’s bravery and perseverance, but also moved by the mutual understanding and sacrifice of Yugong’s son and the mountain elves. Yugong and the mountain god eliminated the obsessions and prejudices in each other’s hearts. Move", the two big mountains were moved away from the sky. Human beings use their courage, perseverance and wisdom to achieve harmonious coexistence with all things in nature. (translated from douban)

title: Hu You Wa
synopsis: The elf was framed by the fake fruit god. The master Tieguai Li was anxious and hid the elf in the treasure gourd and escaped to the world. It happened that Hu Jinxi, a filial son, was bullied by the local gentry. Tieguai Li was moved by Hu Jinxi’s filial piety and severely punished the gentry Li Gongzi, turned the evil boy into a fairy fruit in the world-Huyouwa. (translated from douban)

title: Douluo Dalu: Xing Dou Xian Ji
synopsis: Sixth part of Douluo Dalu (Soul Land)
background: Sixth part of Douluo Dalu (Soul Land)

details.Synonyms: Soul Land Season 6, Douluo Dalu Part 6
details.Japanese: 斗罗大陆之星斗献祭篇; 斗罗大陆 星斗献祭

title: Douluo Dalu: Han Hai Qian Kun
synopsis: 7th part of Soul Land/Douluo Dalu

details.Synonyms: Douluo Dalu Part 7, Soul Land Season 7
details.Japanese: 斗罗大陆之瀚海乾坤篇; 斗罗大陆 瀚海乾坤

title: Jeoryeon Juui Sahang
synopsis: 'Break Ups' is a slice of life story about a young couple with an on-and-off relationship. They stumble upon a time machine that takes them back to several periods in their lives as a couple.

title: Xiyou Ji (2010)
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li
synopsis: "Yeloli's Fairy Dream" tells the story of an ordinary child entering the dream world because of the magical night loli doll. There is a magical world parallel to the human world. The evil queen rules here. She deliberately wants to occupy the human world and turn humans into slaves. The only thing blocking her is the fairy Ye Lori who protects human beings, who are incarnations of dolls quietly acting as guardians. (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season2
synopsis: In this season, the evil queen Mandola takes Peacock and Luo Li back into Wonderland. In order to save their companions, the protagonists will break into the Wonderland again. The fairyland controlled by the queen is even more dangerous, and we will wait and see whether the companion can be rescued. In this season, the new character Kina will appear. She has the mysterious doll Fei Ling and has unique combat skills. Can she defeat Prince Water and Feng Yinsha to stop the evil queen's plan? (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 精灵梦叶罗丽 第二季

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season3
synopsis: In the second season, Feiling chose to sacrifice to make the Queen’s plan fail, and the Queen shut Feiling into the mirror space. Can Zina rescue Feiling and return to the happy days before? Can Zina, who has lost Xianli, regain her confidence? Hei Xiangling and Feng Yinsha, who are closed in the two mirror spaces, will meet again? Will Feng Yinsha return to the human world? Can Jianpeng and Liangcai restore their power? What would happen if the queen took away the memory and turned into Tiexi's iron skin? And what bad tricks would Vincy, who became the master of Tiexi and obtained Ye Luoli's magic, come up with against Wang Mo? Will the water prince returning to the fairyland help the queen? Will Queen Mandola, whose plan has failed, give up? Or will you come up with a new plan? What new challenges will Fairy Ye Luoli and Ye Luoli warriors face? Please look forward to the third season of Ye Luoli. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 精灵梦叶罗丽 第三季

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season4
synopsis: The fourth season of Elf Dream Ye Luoli is a large-scale domestic 3D animation. The first three seasons have been broadcast in multiple rounds across the country and have received widespread attention and love from the audience. The story is full of fun, fantasy, compact plot and full plot. The characters in the play have the appearance of Chinese classical beauties, but they have a modern and fashionable atmosphere. They closely follow the current Chinese style and bring China's unique classical culture to the fullest. (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season5
synopsis: Queen Mandola believes that human beings are selfish and ugly, even if they are kind to help their friends for a while, they are fickle. The store manager Xin Ling Fairy believes that human beings are beautiful and kind. They initiated new bets. The queen seduced Wen Qian with Tiexi's life and forced her to tell Xin Ling's gate location in Wonderland. Although the queen cannot break the spell and travel to the human world, she can set a trap at the gate. In order to amend the ice princess's freezing technique and let Shu Yan grow again, the Ye Luoli warriors returned to the fairyland together. Unexpectedly, as soon as they reached the trap, they stepped into the trap carefully prepared by the queen, and they were sealed into the mirror space by the queen.(translated from douban)

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season6
synopsis: Due to the destruction of nature by humans, the ice princess of Ye Luoli's fairyland has begun to disappear...The ice princess came to the human world and determined to correct the mistakes of history. On the other side, Wen Qian went to Wonderland to help her baby Tiexi retrieve the lost memory. And the new characters in the sixth season all appeared~ who are they? What's the new story? What did the ice princesses who came to the human world do? What kind of agreement was the "seven-day agreement" they made? Will the masters of the Lingxi Pavilion who have opened the door of Lingxi come to the human world? More new secrets will be revealed (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season7
synopsis: Due to the destruction of nature by humans, the ice princess of Ye Luoli's fairyland has begun to disappear...The ice princess came to the human world and determined to correct the mistakes of history. On the other side, can Fairy Xin Ling be resurrected? Will more creatures die? Will Pang Zun and Poison Empress give up? Will other holy fairies in Lingxi Pavilion stand by? Will Arashi and Prince Jin join the battle? What will happen to Wang Mo and Lord Fire? What is the fate of everyone? (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Meng Ye Luo Li season8
synopsis: Can the Ye Luoli warriors who enter the gem box break the seal of memory? What's the secret in Floating Tower Wonderland Bank? What about the golden princes, Zina, Feiling, Mosha, and Huangshi who are trapped in the mirror world? Is the Fire Lord free? Will Fairy Xin Ling be resurrected? What new adventure will happen? Who is the man in black? What is the real purpose of the queen? Why did Princess Spirit imprison the Fire Lord? Will the human world be peaceful? (translated from douban)

title: Meng wa
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Magic Wonderland
synopsis: A baby princess named Ocean is sent away from the North Pole by her mother because of the tyranny of the magma dragon who controls the volcano. The next twelve years, Princess Ocean lives on a local island and encounters a transforming polar bear whom she names Roly Poly. And she talks to a duo of little fish. While encountering the pirates, she meets an inventor named Momo. Their plan is to subdue and defeat the magma dragon.  (Credit: Wikipedia)

title: Huoxian Chuanqi
synopsis: The first CF passionate light animation, dedicated to all friends who love CF! 　　 A biochemical research institute's experimental body went wild and caused a biochemical crisis. The research institute was tragically taken down, and the Defenders Special Operations Team was ordered to perform a cleanup task. At the same time, a team of lurkers wanted to steal super biochemical samples. Under the siege of powerful biochemical monsters, defenders and lurkers turn enemies into friends, fight side by side, and make a way out... (translated from douban)

title: Huoxian Chuanqi Di Er Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Huoxian Chuanqi Di San Ji
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Huoxian Chuanqi Xiao Juchang
synopsis: specials of Huoxian Chuanqi

title: Chi Ji Da Zuozhan
synopsis: The chicken-eating battlefield is full of flames, and the battles are endless and exciting! The box was refined into Voldemort, the licking monster became a courier, the medical team fought violently, and the tactical master lost the choice. Who will end up eating chicken king? Please watch the Chicken Eater Battle!(translated from douban)

title: Chi Ji Da Zuozhan season2
synopsis: A mysterious force has laid a net of heaven and earth on the crisis-ridden desert island. Only those who cross the sandstorm, escape the sand insects, and win the desert race are eligible to enter the finals and face the challenge of the ancient Egyptian god of nine beasts! Can the Miaowang team headed by Wang Xiaosheng escape? What's the hidden conspiracy behind all this? (translated from iqiyi)

title: Chi Ji Da Zuozhan season3
synopsis: In order to catch the gangsters behind the scenes, the Xuanma team headed by Wang Gou will usher in new challenges in the extreme cold places, extreme cold storms, ski racing, glacier climbing, penguin army...extremely harsh environment, dangerous With numerous agencies, can they pass customs smoothly? The open-minded battle mode and humorous adventure will bring you unlimited joy! (translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Chuantong Meide Gushi
synopsis: "Traditional Chinese Virtue Story" is a series of cartoons that reflect the noble moral sentiments of some famous figures in different eras in our history. Each episode tells a character, some of the characters in the story are witty, some are studious, some are brave, some are honest, and some have made great contributions to human science, allowing the audience to watch and feel that life should have The quality of truth, goodness and beauty inspires and perfects his personality. 　　 The various stories in this series are derived from the stories and legends of real characters in history, so they lack some jokes and are not very humorous. Therefore, the character modeling and background basically adopt a realistic style, adding some realism and credibility. Because of the different historical eras, the different identities and personalities of the characters, the different plots and environments, the overall style of the series is unified, and the shapes and scenes of each sub-set have their own characteristics. (translated from douban)

title: Gu Li Gu Li
synopsis: According to the 6Q rule, Guli Guli animation gradually develops children’s intelligence, emotion, creativity, learning, morality, and beauty quotient through vivid and interesting animations. The content covers the five major areas of the national preschool education program: art, society, health, language, science. The adventurous Huang Gu Li, the green Gu Li who is curious about the world, the super learning blue Gu Li, the cute and kind pink Gu Li, and the Red Gu Li who likes challenges. They are happy, sunny, love life, and love to learn. It’s easy for babies to grow up healthily with different colors and different personalities. Let’s walk into the lovely world of Guli together! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Gu Li Gu Li Hao Xiguan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Gu Li Gu Li Zhi Dongwu Shijie
synopsis: There are many interesting animals in the forest of "Gulli Gulli Animal World", and many interesting stories have happened. Do children want to know them and make friends with them? Hurry up and explore the magical animal world with the Guli Guli! ()translated from iqiyi

title: Gu Li Gu Li Yuanwang Ping

title: Gu Li Donghua Luoji Siwei Qimeng

details.Japanese: 咕力动画逻辑思维启蒙

title: Zhonghua Deyu Gushi
synopsis: The content of "The Story of Chinese Moral Education" involves eight aspects of filial piety, loyalty, loyalty, trust, etiquette, righteousness, integrity, and shame in the five thousand years of Chinese history. Under each character, the allusions of ancient sages and celebrities are listed separately and displayed in the form of lively animation. "Chinese Moral Education Story" Dadao Tongtian contains 104 episodes of moral education stories (divided into four), which were broadcast on CCTV's movie channel in 2008, 2009, and 2010. The content is touching and each story shows us the wisdom of the ancients. Open up our nature and benevolence. This film is suitable for people from all walks of life to watch, such as companies, schools, and children who watch it frequently. It gradually lays down the foundation of virtue, knows how to respect parents, love and care for classmates; help parents and children learn and grow together, enhance their spiritual realm, and promote social goodness. Truly make the Chinese traditional culture continue uninterrupted. (translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Deyu Gushi season2
synopsis: season 2 of it.

title: Zhonghua Deyu Gushi season3
synopsis: season3 of it.

title: Zhonghua Deyu Gushi season10
synopsis: season10 of it.

title: Zhonghua Qinxue Gushi
synopsis: This series of cartoons of 8 minutes and 30 seconds per episode selects anecdotes about the diligent study of some people with lofty ideals from ancient China to modern civilization for thousands of years. Since ancient times, how many people with lofty ideals have become talented because of diligent study, and they have left many ancient stories, such as "Bang Yingying Xue", "Hanging beam stabbing stock", "Chiseling the wall to steal light" and so on. This large-scale animation series is based on the diligent and studious stories of celebrities of the past dynasties. It selects materials such as "Hua Tuo Studying Medicine", "Zhuge Liang Feeding Chickens", "Lu Ban Learning Art", "Li Bai Tiechu Grinds into Needles", and "Wang Xizhi" "Eating Ink", "Zhang Sanfeng Creates Tai Chi" and other content. These are historical figures familiar to the children. Each episode has a character and a story. All stories are examples of diligent learning in the history of the Chinese nation. This cartoon integrates knowledge, fun, and education, and strives to bring happiness to children through wonderful stories and rich cartoon fun, and at the same time, it is entertaining and entertaining, so that children can enjoy Understand that only through diligence, studious and continuous hard work can you become a talent(translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Meide Gushi
synopsis: Chinese Virtue Story: The "Chinese Virtue Story" series of cartoons uses real ancient people and ancient things as a template, and uses the eight virtues: filial piety, loyalty, faith, etiquette, justice, integrity, and shame as themes, and a lively way of interpretation through animated stories , To create thousands of moral hero images that have traveled through time and space, standing in the hearts of children, allowing thousands of descendants of Yan and Huang to feel their nation’s huge and profound wisdom in life, and to correctly understand the connotation and essence of traditional morality. The past serves the present. Get more important than classroom knowledge education, and be inspired and moved by the thoughts and emotions of a lifetime. In terms of themes, the animations are all real people and facts in history. According to the "Twenty-Five History" and other well-documented historical materials, we strive to maintain the original flavor of each story in the narrative rationale, and then follow the appropriate animation The format of the story is slightly adapted. The animations are all based on positive ethical codes of conduct. While praising excellent traditional morals, they use the softest way to warn (solve) modern ills. Based on the original intention of "caring", we let the eight traditional virtues form an emotional curtain to care for the children's body and mind.(translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Zhishui Gushi
synopsis: Tells 26 stories related to water control in Chinese history. For example, the mythology of Nuwa repairing the sky, Jingwei reclamation of the sea and the historical Dayu's water control, Ximen Leopard, and the opening of the Grand Canal by Emperor Yang of the Sui Dynasty are all popular stories. The cartoon aims to convey more of the traditional Chinese concept of water management of harmony between man and nature and "the harmony between man and nature". (translated from douban)

title: Jiu Ye Shen Chuan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Zhonghua Chuantong Wenhua Gushi·Jieqing Pian
synopsis: The 80-episode two-dimensional cartoon "Stories of Chinese Traditional Culture·Festivals" produced by Ningbo Lepiter Culture Media Co., Ltd. uses humorous language and tells stories to show the origins of the annual festivals and customs of the Chinese nation. Spread Chinese traditional customs and culture in the form of animation. The film is divided into four chapters, narrated in the order of the origin of the festival and the origin of the festival customs. The content covers traditional Chinese festivals-Spring Festival, Lantern Festival, Ching Ming Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, Qixi Festival, Mid-Autumn Festival, Double Ninth Festival, Laba Festival , The eight solar terms that were first selected as festivals — Li Chun, Li Xia, Li Qiu, Li Dong and Spring Equinox, Summer Solstice, Autumn Equinox, Winter Solstice, and Minority Festivals — Yi Torch Festival, Miao Sisters’ Festival, Yao Nationality’s Bird Catching Festival, The Dai Water Splashing Festival, etc., uses story plots and character animations to integrate Chinese traditional culture, extending a series of traditional cultural stories, so that children can learn about Chinese history and culture and the origin of traditional Chinese festivals in a relaxed and happy way.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 中华传统文化故事·节庆篇

title: Zhonghua Meide Gushi·Chengxin Pian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Dexing Tianxia Zhi Zhonghua Deyu Gushi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 德行天下之中华德育故事

title: Kekr, Ke Xin Yijia Ren
synopsis: This series tells the interesting stories of the protagonists Coco and Kexin, the 5-year-old twin brothers and sisters, in an ordinary family, an ordinary residential area and an ordinary kindergarten. It focuses on children, family and society from a new perspective. , And all the topics are unfolded and resolved in a humorous and interesting way. (translated from douban)

title: Keke Ke Xin Yijia Ren 2
synopsis: This film tells the story of various anecdotes that happened in an ordinary family, an ordinary residential community, and an ordinary kindergarten where the protagonist Coco and Kexin, a pair of dragon and phoenix fetuses who are both opposed and aligned, are located, which reflects emotions, environmental protection, etc. A series of social topics such as technology, education, fashion, pets, and human relations.(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Maguo He
synopsis: The pony in the fairy tale "Pony Crossing the River" has to go to the other side of the river to do business again. But on this day, the wind and rain were heavy and the river was turbulent. Uncle Donkey, who was waiting for his daughter's return by the river, advised the pony not to cross the river. The little horse disapproved, and jumped into the river rather braggingly, was swept away by the current, caught in a whirlpool, and fell into the time tunnel. Then the pony came to Majiabang in the Neolithic Age where there were many beasts, strange species, and magical spells. This film tells the story of the little horse looking for a way home... (translated from youku)

title: Long Dou Taiqiu
synopsis: Ding Junhui, a red-headed boy who was just nine years old, was influenced by his father and loved billiards since he was a child. He also dreams of one day that he can win glory like his father. Finally, the Long Dou Billiards National Competition has begun! Children can use the mecha in their hands to enhance their strength for competition. However, if you want to enter the national competition, you must have your own "city ranking." From the day when Xiaohui got the gift of the billiard mecha from his father, the "Flame Lion", he practiced hard to beat his opponent and improve his ranking. In the process of Xiaohui's competition and practice, Xiaohui met his life-long opponent and best friend, Xiao Fan (Fan Hailan), the talented billiard player ranked first in the country. Xiaohui, who never accepted defeat, constantly challenged Xiaofan. Exercise during the challenge and encouragement from Xiaofan. So Xiaohui has made rapid progress in both technology and thinking. Before the national competition, Xiaohui also handed in another good friend and talented billiard intelligence analyst, the Malaysian overseas Chinese-Xiaodong (Fang Zhidong). With the joint efforts of Xiaohui, Xiaodong and Xiaofan, they defeated the bandit regiment controlled by the mysterious Asen (Guo Tiansen) and the destructive billiard player Adu (Du Tieyan). After several twists and turns, Adu finally joined the Chinese team. In order to become the number one in the world and win glory for the country, he embarked on the dragon ball game with other players: Ding Junhui, Fan Hailan, Fang Zhidong...(translated from douban)

title: Fu Wu Shu Sanshiliu Ji
synopsis: The story of "Five Rats and Thirty-Six Strategies" takes place in a wonderful world. There are three kingdoms, the cat kingdom, the mouse kingdom and the dog kingdom. In the world where Ping Le and Ping Le get along with each other, the new king of the cat country (the petty cat) decided to eliminate the mouse country and occupy the dog country for his own desires. Due to the cowardice of the old king of the rat country, the rat country gradually declined. When the mouse country was about to be wiped out, a brave and righteous mouse (Fufushu) brought his four friends Jijishu, Xiangxiangshu, Rurushu, and Yiyishu to come forward, thus deducing a classic story . (translated from douban)

title: Fu Wu Shu Zhi Sunzi Bingfa
synopsis: After the thief cat returned to the mountains and forests, after a few years, the petty cat wanted to attack the mouse country again... 　　The Cat Nation mobilized the huge forces of ten legions to attack the Rat Nation. . Soon after the Leiyun Pass, the fortress of the Rat Country, was defeated, the Rat King wanted to surrender in fright. Fu Fu Rat and his friends decided to fight the Cat Country. After research, they believe that although the number of troops in the Cat Nation is more than three times that of the Rat Nation, they have many shortcomings. Fu Wushu decided to use Sun Tzu's strategy of war, and decided to lie in ambush in the Dragon Valley of Suolong Mountain to annihilate the Cat Nation Army. (translated from douban)

title: Fu Wu Shu Zhi Zhanguo Fengyun
synopsis: "Five Rats: The Warring States Storm" is about the battle between the cat country, the mouse country, the dog country, the fang country and the fearless country. Due to the expansion of the Territory of the Rat Land, Fu Fu Rats need to be stationed in the border from time to time. Above the court, the Rat King, due to his advanced age, arranged his nearest minister, Grey Squirrel, to manage the country. However, due to the negligence of the gray squirrels, civil strife occurred in the country. Soon afterwards, the remnant fangs of the Cat Nation launched a rebellion. The cat and mouse rebels united to attack the mouse country and the cat country, and established the Fang Nation. The war on this continent rekindled. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Qingtian Situ Gong
synopsis: During the Wanli reign of the Ming Dynasty, Situ Jun High School was the champion and served as the magistrate of Taiping County. During his tenure, he helped the strong and the weak, punished the evil and promoted the good, and had a series of interesting stories with the lovely and kind arresters. The film makes full use of the animation's features of imagination, exaggeration and humor. The production level is excellent and suitable for audiences of all ages. (translated from douban)

title: Xiayi Xiao Qingtian
synopsis: As China’s first large-scale three-dimensional detective martial arts animation, "The Chivalrous Little Blue Sky" is based on traditional Chinese culture and incorporates the well-known traditional martial arts story "Seven Chivalry and Five Righteousness". It tells Bao Zheng as the protagonist in his youth. The stories of young friends such as Zhan Zhao and Wushu who used courage and wisdom to solve various complicated cases fully demonstrated the wise image of the young Bao Zheng, who was not afraid of difficulties and persevering in justice. Let people appreciate the visual impact brought by the beautiful pictures while promoting many national quintessence in the Chinese culture(translated from douban)

title: Yin Cha Zhi Gongfu Xue Yuan
synopsis: In other words, in our time, kung fu has not disappeared, and Kung Fu still exists in modern times!! (Just like there are supermen in the United States...) Not far from us, there is a "one and two mountains", "one There is a legendary Kungfu Academy on the top of "Two Mountains", which specializes in teaching Chinese Kungfu for children to keep fit. (Because there are not many students and the income is low, the academy equipment seems a bit shabby). Under the leadership of the director of Youtiao, Kung Fu Academy has cultivated generations of kung fu boys. Every year when the peach blossoms bloom, the academy will recruit new students into the academy. Of course, this year is no exception... 　　 On this day, Kung Fu Academy is about to start. "Kung Fu Academy" will usher in a group of new rookies, but this time it is a little different... On the way to the school, the freshman bun picked up a little dumpling classmate. The dumplings followed her and couldn't get rid of them. She had to take the dumplings to the school and became the youngest student in the school. Because this group of freshmen is a group of little boys who don’t know the heights of the sky, but they have incomparable energy, they almost messed up the Kung Fu Academy, especially the little dumplings who always try to taste the things in the Academy... . In addition, there are horrifying shaomai, rich girls' buns, timid birthday peaches, favorite burgers, hot dogs and other students... These new students of Kung Fu students gathered together, and a series of funny things happened around them. The story happens, and there is a whole lot of fresh things.(translated from douban)

title: Dou Xiao Ya
synopsis: This preschool comedy cartoon shows the protagonist Dou Xiaoya and his two best friends, Xiaowo and Jinbao, experienced various exciting and full of twists and turns. Their adventure not only happened in the idyllic cave town, but also all over our world. In these adventures, Dou Xiaoya and his partners showed a positive and optimistic attitude of "be yourself", thus advocating the concept of guiding children to overcome difficulties and develop creative thinking. (translated from douban)

title: Dou Xiao Ya Tanxian Xiao Qiaomen
synopsis: Bean Duckling Adventure Tips is one of the chapters of Bean Duckling Special 　　 In 1 minute and 30 seconds, Dou Xiaoya and his good friends Jin Bao and Xiao Wo had to face various adventure problems and gave us different tips. 　　 These little tricks are full of creativity and can make everyone laugh. 　　 What exploration challenges are facing the "hill trio"? What are their tips? Please find the answer in Dou Duck Adventure Tips (translated from douban)

title: Dou Xiao Ya Mini Xiao Maoxian
synopsis: In each episode of the short story, within 1 minute and 30 seconds, the protagonist Dou Xiaoya and his friends Jin Bao and Xiao Wo go up into the sky from time to time, sometimes travel through time and space, sometimes become bigger and smaller, have super powers, and sometimes "be stupid" in the second stage. There are lots of jokes... presenting a scene of wonderful and interesting adventure stories for everyone (translated from douban)

title: Dou Xiao Ya Shwnqi Xiao Fendui
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 豆小鸭 神奇小分队

title: Zuqiu Jianghu
synopsis: The hero, Zhai Hualong, his father is a martial arts coach, and his grandfather is an old Chinese doctor. He learned martial arts since he was a child, but never practiced football. Because of his parents’ job transfer, he came to a big city from a small place and was ridiculed for a bit rustic. His father and grandfather wanted him to engage in martial arts and Chinese medicine, but did not support him in professional football. But Zhai Hualong is in love with football, eager to become a professional football player, and is eager to be recognized by students from big cities. He joined the elite football school team, using the basis of learning martial arts from a young age, he perfectly integrated football and Chinese martial arts, and he has become more and more familiar with world football knowledge. With the game after game, the small audience was also educated to be tenacious, to value teamwork and not to be afraid of difficulties. (translated from douban)

title: Lao Dai He Xiao Dai
synopsis: Tells the story of a single parent family. The protagonist is a six-year-old pupil Xiaodai and his father Laodai. They live in the 21st century city and feel the warmth and warmth of this society. Laodai is a middle-aged man with some knowledge and knowledge. He is alone with his son Xiaodai. Lao Da is afraid that Xiao Da will be affected by the bad things in the world, so he takes great care of him. Sometimes things will be reversed, but Xiao Da is extremely interested in anything new. They have encountered liars, thieves, and gangsters, and they have also encountered live Lei Feng, heroes who have acted bravely. Of course, the timid and fearful will occasionally perform as a big hero. Xiaodai is not a timid master, he often fears that the world will not be chaotic, don't be fooled by his stunned appearance. At the same time, this film is not limited to conventions, it is a cartoon with magical colors. It is humorous, ironic and educational. It is not only suitable for children to watch, but also attracts older friends and parents to watch.(translated from douban)

title: Xiaoxiong You En
synopsis: Ahan, the "new father" who is devoted to taking care of naughty children; Lily, the "new mother" who is dedicated to work and loves her children; and their clever, naughty, and constantly growing baby son "You En" - they bring us together A wonderful story about a newborn family. No one has taught Ah Han how to raise a child, and Yuen, who refuses to cooperate and is full of jokes, is the biggest source of his headache. He needs to change the baby's diaper, take Youen for vaccinations, teach Youen to recognize numbers, and repel mosquitoes in the baby's room. Derived from life and entertaining, this is the growth history of a super dad and a textbook for happy parenting.(translated from douban)

title: Ben Ben
synopsis: BUN BUN is an innocent new-born puppy, abandoned in a wooden box. It was picked up by a stray dog named Uncle Tyke. BUNBUN began to learn how to find food, treat diseases, and repel other stray dogs. In short, learn how to live on the margins of society. In return, it was Uncle Tyke who also learned a cheerful attitude towards life. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Xiao Shijie Lixian Ji
synopsis: Xiao Ai is a stubborn and outspoken girl. Just like her peers, she is fascinated by fashion, gadgets, pop music, and talent shows on TV. Her ambition is to become a famous, rich and beautiful person, and her pursuit of life is very material. Came to Harmony Valley during the holiday, but she became a little giant, and her panda backpack also talked, and formed Chaoyang Club with two friends, and competed with the captain Kang Na of the Sunset Club and two members . Through a period of life and experience, Xiao Ai has a new understanding of life: learning more knowledge, caring for nature is the essence of life. (translated fro douban)

title: Chong Chong Nao Fantian
synopsis: Tell about a group of cute little bugs in Chongchong Village: the little bees are so much honey, the butterfly is sweet, the dung beetle, the spider's eight-legged mother-in-law, the firefly brothers bright and shiny, and a toad big-mouthed frog living in a puddle and His follower flies with iron heads, and the bugs encounter all kinds of interesting stories and problems. They use their different ingenuities and use child-like theories to explain and think about everything. Hilarious and humorous stories between them(translated from douban)

title: Koushui Feng Shen
synopsis: The plot mainly tells the story of the Conferred God of King Wu's defeat of the history of the gods, and the second remake was made in the previous way. The main characters appeared in various chapters in the Conferred God War to promote the development of the plot and retell the background origin, and finally in the Conferred God All the deceased who participated in the war in the conference will be canonized by Jiang Ziya as a righteous god and listed in the immortal family to serve in the heaven. [1]  In the last years of the Yin and Shang Dynasties, the king of Shang and Zhou Yin was abused and desecrated Nüwa, and the country was turbulent. It caused wars in the world, and the immortals and demons from all walks of life came to fight, expounding the two religions to show off the martial arts, and the Western Zhou and Chaoge parties called for a war of soldiers. In the end, the Shang Dynasty was destroyed and destroyed... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Er Tu Da Mengxiang
synopsis: Ertu sings happily every day, and takes the Meiji left by his grandfather to collect delicacies from all over the world, and use these delicacies to cultivate the carrots in his radish field. With this kind of carrot, there will be no more famine in the world, and people who have eaten this kind of carrot will become as happy as themselves. Of course, there is a bad-intentioned guy-Dr. Wai Wai (Fox). He dreams of stealing Ertu’s Meijiduo, and has studied the principle of collecting delicious food so that he can achieve the Qibel Prize faster. dream. In the end, Ertu can always use his own wisdom to crush Dr. Waiwai’s cunning plan with Pippi, a bone-eating dog, Duodao, a squirrel who loves to sing, and other friends who also have good dreams. The stone hit him in the foot. (translated from douban)

title: An Jie Shen Shi
synopsis: In order to find the missing friend Xiao Yuan, the protagonist, Jiang Yao, sneaked into an abandoned villa to investigate, but was caught by a mysterious black shadow by accident and almost doomed. However, this was only the beginning of his bad luck. Behind the chain of events, Jiang Yao gradually realized that he was following him as a person who "shouldn't exist". The shadowy crisis, the truth about the disappearance of his friends, the hidden organization of the dark world... Behind the bizarre incident, a conspiracy that spans a thousand years has quietly awakened, and the battle between righteous and evil is about to begin. The animation incorporates suspense, adventure, inspiration and other elements, presenting the audience a struggle story of self-improvement and positive energy. (Source: bilibili, translated)
background: Based on Huohong Senlin's (火红森林) webnovel of the same title.

Studios: Hai An Xian Donghua Gongzuo Shi

title: Wan Jie Fa Shen
synopsis: At the end of the calendar 2020, the continent of Stern, which has reached the end of civilization due to the exhaustion of magic elements, ushered in the destruction of the continent under the void storm. Ye Xuan, the last god of law in the mainland, unexpectedly awakened in the era of the prosperous magic civilization three thousand years ago and became an ordinary student at the Sith Magic Academy on the border of the Kingdom of Orlando in the northwest of the mainland. In order to save the mainland and prevent the end from coming, Ye Xuan began to explore the mystery of the dark turmoil that led to the depletion of magical elements in the mainland three thousand years ago, to prevent the mainland crisis. (Source: Donghua Info)

title: Mo He Yu Gesheng
synopsis: There is a mysterious country on the earth called the Magic Kingdom. The magic box owned by the queen there, and the magic of goodness in the magic box is what protects the kingdom. But the magic power of good is almost exhausted, and the evil wizard Abba is coming to occupy the magic kingdom. At this time, the queen told the little princess that there is a China in the east of the earth, and the singing of Chinese children is the source of the magic of goodness. The queen asked her magic guard to protect the magic kingdom for 7 days. She and the princess rode a flying horse to China. On the way, the Aba witch came and he wanted to prevent the queen from going to China. The Aba witch killed the queen. Before the queen died, she gave the magic box to the princess and asked the princess to go to China... (translated from douban)

title: Ka Xi Long Zhi Xun Long Ji
synopsis: "Cassie Dragon Hunting Dragon" tells the story of human beings and the "Golden Way and Five Dragons" transformed from the "Five Great Stones" in the future high-tech era, maintaining the peace of the universe and fighting against the predators of the universe. (translated from douban)

title: Xiangrikui
synopsis: Although roses and sunflowers are neighbors, their personalities are completely different. Roses are beautiful and capricious, self-centered; sunflowers are positive and helpful. Roses and sunflowers with opposite personalities live together, and many things have happened. Together, they participate in the flower kingdom competition, looking for dreams and happiness. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiangrikui 2
synopsis: Roses and sunflowers live in the beautiful Baihuayuan. Although they are neighbors, they have completely different personalities. Roses are beautiful and capricious, often self-centered; sunflowers are positive and helpful. Roses and sunflowers live together, and many things have happened. Under the influence of sunflowers, roses have changed many bad habits and are welcomed by everyone. (translated from douban)
